mapper.sql: product_id, title, description, content, picture, saler_id, price, sale_counts
mapper.insert: insert into product (product_id, title, description, content, picture, saler_id, price, sale_counts) values (#{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{saleCounts,jdbcType=INTEGER})

product_id,

mapper.update:
update product
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
picture = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
saler_id = #{salerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sale_counts = #{saleCounts,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
